title: ISic020131. ISic020131
body:
Facsimile Images

((val03)) (uncertain interpretation)
λε̄́(κυθος)

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I) ; Λεω, Alessio 1970 ; Λεω or Λεο-, Lejeune 1970

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Abbreviation ΛΕ frequently used on Attic vases with the value of λήκυθος. However, there are no examples of this abbreviation associated with a value notation. Agostianiani suggests interpreting the alphabetical sign as a value notation (one obol), thus proposing to translate how: "One lekythos (corresponding to the value of) one obol". See also Hackl 1909, p.98.

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 1977 131 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002201
  • Alessio 1970 60 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002566
  • Lejeune 1970 148, 161, 163 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001880
  • Schmoll 1961 68 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001602
  • Tusa 1960 no.12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001542
  • Hackl 1909 98 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002565
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
